Previous: paśNext: paś2

√paś1 'see'

present: [4.] páśyati  páśyate etc. V.+  

perfect: paspaśé etc.  

aorist: [1.] áspaṣṭa   -- [3.] apaspaśat  

verbal: spaṣṭa V.+  

secondary: causative: spāśayate etc.  spāśayati  

derivatives: páś?  paśya V.+  paśyin C.  paśyata AV.  -paśyana C.  spáś V.B.  spaśa B.+  -spā́śana AV.  paspaśā C.  

The stem paśya is regarded as supplying the deficient present of √dṛś.
